scripts.dev: VITE_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) VITE_APP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 npm run x
scripts.dev:online: VITE_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) VITE_APP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 npm run x
scripts.x: hc s clean &&  npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run start:happ" "hc run-local-services -b $BOOTSTRAP_PORT -s $SIGNAL_PORT"
scripts.x:online: hc s clean &&  npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run start:happ" "hc run-local-services -b $BOOTSTRAP_PORT -s $SIGNAL_PORT"
scripts.tool-devy: concurrently "npm start -w ui" "sleep 1 && we-dev-cli --agent-idx 1 --dev-config we_dev/config.ts" "sleep 10 && we-dev-cli --agent-idx 2 --dev-config we_dev/config.ts"
scripts.tool-devx: BPORT=46263 SPORT=46262; concurrently "hc run-local-services -b $BPORT -s $SPORT" "npm start -w ui" "./we_dev/we.AppImage  --dev-config we_dev/config.json --agent-num 1 -b http://127.0.0.1:$BPORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SPORT" "sleep 10 && ./we_dev/we.AppImage --dev-config we_dev/config.json --agent-num 2 -b http://127.0.0.1:$BPORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SPORT"
scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.online:network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:online" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.launch:happ: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/whosin.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network mem
scripts.launch:online2: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/whosin.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network webrtc "wss://127.0.0.1:18929"
scripts.launch:online: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/whosin.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-2.infra.holochain.org webrtc wss://signal-2.infra.holochain.org
scripts.package: rm -f ui/dist.zip && rm -rf ui/dist && npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
